Text:
Most of the features work correctly except unlimited health.  You can still be killed by car explosions and if the police shoot you enough you will die.

Also, if you use the teleport feature, you will most likely fall through the map.  You have to teleport from a higher elevation place to a lower elevation place, if you do the opposite you will fall through most of the time.
Keep in mind that this trainer will only work with Mafia II version 1.0.0, NOT version 1.0.1.
